title: Convicted double murderer sentenced to 50 years for Fall River slayings
author: Morgan Rousseau
bullets: Crime Jeremy Holmes, 23, walked into a park and shot and killed two people in May 2021 — a 29-year-old man and a 14-year-old boy.
A judge on Friday sentenced a Fall River man to 50 years to life in prison for the 2021 shooting deaths of two people, Bristol County District Attorney Thomas Quinn’s office announced.

title: Driver, 23, killed in Cape Cod car crash
author: Morgan Rousseau
bullets: Local News Police announced that Paul A.

A young Carver man has died following a fiery three-car crash that shut down a Cape Cod highway on Wednesday.
